languages.text: "Если вы не развлекаетесь, играя моими чувствами, почему бы не попробовать? Да, давайте. Или — ой, вы же еще не спросили, как я смотрю на то, чтобы стать вашей любовной спутницей. Спрашивайте скорее, шерин".

"If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."
languages.original_text: "Если вы не развлекаетесь, играя моими чувствами, почему бы не попробовать? Да, давайте. Или — ой, вы же еще не спросили, как я смотрю на то, чтобы стать вашей любовной спутницей. Спрашивайте скорее, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Si no solo se está divirtiendo a costa de mis emociones, ¿por qué no lo intenta? Adelante. O... bueno, todavía no me ha preguntado mi opinión sobre ser su pareja. No tarde, shereen».
languages.original_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."

traits.locale_text: «Si no solo se está divirtiendo a costa de mis emociones, ¿por qué no lo intenta? Adelante. O... bueno, todavía no me ha preguntado mi opinión sobre ser su pareja. No tarde, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如果你并不打算玩弄我的感情，以此自娱自乐的话，那为什么不尝试一下呢？来吧。或者——等等，你还没问过我要不要成为你的爱侣呢。快点问吧，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."

traits.locale_text: “如果你并不打算玩弄我的感情，以此自娱自乐的话，那为什么不尝试一下呢？来吧。或者——等等，你还没问过我要不要成为你的爱侣呢。快点问吧，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「もしあたしの気持ちをもてあそぶことを楽しめていないのなら、やってみたらどうかしら？ほら。それか―待って頂戴。まだ恋愛のパートナーになるかどうか、聞かれてなかったわね。さあ、聞いてちょうだい、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「もしあたしの気持ちをもてあそぶことを楽しめていないのなら、やってみたらどうかしら？ほら。それか―待って頂戴。まだ恋愛のパートナーになるかどうか、聞かれてなかったわね。さあ、聞いてちょうだい、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous ne jouez pas avec mes sentiments pour le seul plaisir de vous divertir, pourquoi ne pas essayer ? Allez-y. Encore que... vous ne m'avez toujours demandé s'il me plairait de devenir votre partenaire de cœur. Ne tardez pas trop, shereen. »
languages.original_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous ne jouez pas avec mes sentiments pour le seul plaisir de vous divertir, pourquoi ne pas essayer ? Allez-y. Encore que... vous ne m'avez toujours demandé s'il me plairait de devenir votre partenaire de cœur. Ne tardez pas trop, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Euch nicht nur amüsiert, indem Ihr mit meinen Gefühlen spielt, warum versucht Ihr es dann nicht? Nur zu. Oder ... wartet, Ihr habt mich noch gar nicht gefragt, wie es mir damit geht, Eure romantische Partnerin zu sein. Fragt bald, Shereen."
languages.original_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Euch nicht nur amüsiert, indem Ihr mit meinen Gefühlen spielt, warum versucht Ihr es dann nicht? Nur zu. Oder ... wartet, Ihr habt mich noch gar nicht gefragt, wie es mir damit geht, Eure romantische Partnerin zu sein. Fragt bald, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."

languages.text: "Eğer tek amacın duygularımla oynayıp eğlenmek değilse neden şansını denemiyorsun? Hadi... Dur. Daha senin romantik partnerin olma konusunda neler düşündüğümü sormadın bile. Geç olmadan sor şirinim."
languages.original_text: "If you are not simply amusing yourself by toying with my feelings, then why not give it a try? Go on. Or — wait, you haven't yet asked how I feel about being your romantic partner. Ask soon, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer tek amacın duygularımla oynayıp eğlenmek değilse neden şansını denemiyorsun? Hadi. Veya dur. Daha senin romantik partnerin olma konusunda neler düşündüğümü sormadın bile bana. Sor yakında şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
